name: tm48
effect: Teaches Skill Swap to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Round to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Skill Swap Gen II: Fire Punch Gen I: Rock Slide)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.
flavor_text.platinum: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.
